widget.name: ListviewSearchUI
widget.description: Provides an extension of the searchfield of a listview: show/hide functionality as well as moving the searchfield to a different location.

property.caption: Target listview
property.description: Fill in the exact - unique - name of the listview

property.caption: Widget mode
property.description: Button mode: show / hide the searchfield, Position mode: alter the searchfields location, Full mode: both functionalities

property.caption: Missing search mode
property.description: What to do when no searchfield or listview could be found. Disabled mode: sets the button to disabled, hideMode: hides the complete widget

property.caption: Hide search on start
property.description: Hides the listviews searchfield on start

property.caption: Button label
property.description: Optional button label to use in the button

property.caption: Button icon
property.description: Default the search glyphicon will be used. If a Bootstrap glyphicon icon is entered by classname the used glyphicon will be replaced by the new one. (e.g. 'glyphicon-user')
